name: Sell Digitial Products with Oronjo
author: orangewise

sections.description:
Oronjo is an e-commerce platform for selling digital downloads directly to your audience. Upload and sell ebooks, videos, music, comics, design or anything else digital you create. Oronjo will list your products and automatically deliver them to customers after the purchase.

  • The Sell Digital Downloads plugin allows you to easily import/update your Oronjo products into your WordPress blog/site. The plugin makes selling your intangibles super easy! Sell digital products directly to your audience and get paid instantly.
  • Buy now buttons and/or links are automatically added to your Oronjo products, no coding required.
  • When customers buy your products, they are added to the Oronjo shopping cart on your WordPress website.
  • The cart makes it possible to sell multiple products in 1 transaction. Your customers check out the cart once which reduces your transaction costs resulting in higher profits.
  • With Oronjo you can your digital products on your weblog; chapters of your novel; your best MP3 mixes; your thesis; Hi-res versions of your photos; or your homemade movies.
  • Get your free Oronjo account today: Oronjo Signup
  • Check our Oronjo WordPress Plugin Overview for a comparison of our plugins.

Features

  • Checkout with the most popular payment method on the internet: PayPal
  • Sell multiple products in 1 transaction using the shopping cart
  • We do not limit total storage, bandwidth and you can have unlimited number of products
  • There is no need for a secure section on your site, the checkout is handled by Oronjo.
  • Lowest transactions fees in the industry. Oronjo delivers the best value for your money.
  • Automatic delivery. After your customers have paid, the products will be automatically delivered.
  • Superfast downloads for your customers. Oronjo uses a Content Delivery Network which means that up- and downloads will be fast around the globe, even in remote areas.
  • Check our Oronjo WordPress Plugin Overview for a comparison of our plugins.

Contact

Suggestion, fixes, rants, congratulations, gifts et al to ro[at]oronjo.nl
sections.installation:
1. Search for ‘Sell Digital Products’ in your plugin menu in the WordPress dashboard, install and activate.
  2. Setup the plugin through the ‘Settings > Sell Content’ > menu in WordPress

or

  1. Download the plugin and unzip it.
  2. Upload the folder sell-digital-products/ to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Setup the plugin through the ‘Settings > Sell digital products’ > menu in WordPress
  5. Installation finished.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Search for ‘Sell Digital Products’ in your plugin menu in the WordPress dashboard, install and activate.
  2. Setup the plugin through the ‘Settings > Sell Content’ > menu in WordPress

or

  1. Download the plugin and unzip it.
  2. Upload the folder sell-digital-products/ to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Setup the plugin through the ‘Settings > Sell digital products’ > menu in WordPress
  5. Installation finished.
